Description:
Who are we and what we stand for?When you work at Schneider Electric you work at a company that is passionate about its people. Our people vision says, Great people make Schneider Electric a great company. We are proud to promote purpose, diversity, inclusion, learning and work-life integration – we’re a great place to work and we are continually striving to be the best place to work!Your role in a nutshellField Sales for planning customer visits to answer their customers
Help Disk for answering customer requests regarding Presales functions (configuration & selection)
Help Disk for Technical support
Help disk for product availability
VSD Service eng. For Application notes
End users for Application Configuration & Trainings
Channels For Application Configuration & Closing dealsJob responsibilitiesSupport Field sales, Channel managers, Channels to close VSD Deals with End Users
Specify Schneider VSD Products in Customers specification & Convert Competition specifications to Schneider Products
Answer customer requests asking the Help desk for Solutions
External VSD Advanced Trainings (Customer Workshops)
Develop VSD Application Notes
Report Success stories to the Product Marketing
Prepare quotations for Customers with VSD Solutions QualificationsBAC + 5 (Electrotechnique / électronique) Technical education and/or engineering degree preferableProfessional experienceHas relevant experience on building applications in SE's system platforms and knows the possibilities and limitations of them.Minimum to enter in the positionTechnical engineering/application design or validation background
Preferable experience with Schneider Electric TechnologyTechnical and Managerial skillsB.SC in Electrical Engineering.
Schneider products range knowledge.
Excellent knowledge of Arabic and English; French is an asset.
Analytical thinking, creative, good communicator, Presentation skills
Problems solving capacity.
Customer service oriented.Job Details
